Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1986...
Injured on 6/26/1987 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/23/1988 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/7/1988, off Larry Christenson (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/1988, off Lee Guetterman (CHC)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against St. Louis on 5/23/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1990, hitting .400 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Philadelphia, driving in 4 runs on 4/1/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (N) on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: CF B. Giles, RF S. Green, C G. Williams. Going to NYM: LF G. Sheffield, 2B R. Gant, RF T. Benzinger, P J. Jones)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1993, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1993, hitting .478 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
